import { useState } from "react" import { useParams, useHistory } from "react-router-dom" function Translate() { const { translateParam } = useParams() const [fromOrigine, setfromOrigine] = useState("english") const [toOrigine, settoOrigine] = useState("french") const [inputLangue, setinputLangue] = useState("") const history = useHistory() function OnclickTranslate(e) { e.preventDefault() console.log("ma valeur ", fromOrigine) history.push(`/translate/${fromOrigine}-${toOrigine}-${inputLangue}.html`) } return (
{ setinputLangue(e.target.value) }} />
) } export default Translate
